name: Nimble Nature
description: The Inchling's delicate frame, while reducing their heart count, gifts them with unmatched agility, allowing for rapid strikes. However, their compact stature demands closer engagements, slightly limiting their combat and building reach. In this balance of vulnerability and speed, the Inchling thrives.

badges.text: You have five (5) hearts total, 0.5 more attack speed, 0.25 less attack range, and 1 less build range.
